text:
Guido Gorgatti (born 5 December 1919) is a Italian-born Argentine movie and television actor. His career began in 1935. Gorgatti is known for his roles in "Somos todos inquilinos" (1954), "El Gaucho" (1964) and "Mingo y Aníbal contra los fantasmas" (1985).
Gorgatti was born in Rovigo, Italy. He was raised in Buenos Aires.

annotations.surface_form: Mingo y Aníbal contra los fantasmas
